_sText:
UPDATE 28.06.2010 - New V4 version for Orange Box Engine
(+ new lighting, improved textures, ring model and new secret room)


Here's the new version of de_sonic :

Changelog :
- background musics (press the buttons :)
- new secret paths
- more visual elements
- more lights inside and new lighting outside
- the bomb respawns when it falls in a hole
- and a lot of minor things

I hope you will enjoy it (... again ... :)
